job.title: AWS DevOps Engineer
job.description: <p>Title: Azure/AWS DevOps Engineer</p><p>Location: 100% Remote</p><p>Type: Direct-hire</p><p><br></p><p>Job Description: Global company has an urgent need for a junior to mid-level AWS DevOps Engineer. The position will be the right-hand to the VP of Architecture and DevOps and has growth potential as they grow their DevOps environment. Candidate must be willing to move to AWS in 6 months as they acquired a competitor who is an Azure/AWS shop and they do not have this expertise. Seeking a candidate that is focused on organizational issues, social aspects, understanding how things are done, ability to communicate, and passion for teaching, not just technical. Charisma is welcomed.</p><p><br></p><p>Required Skills:</p><p>- AWS</p><p>- CICD</p><p>- Docker</p><p>- Observability (metrics and alerting)</p><p></p>
